controllingcostcodes.assignToCostCodeTitle: Assign Controlling Cost Code to Cost Code
controllingcostcodes.assignToChildCostCodes: Assign controlling cost code to child cost codes also
controllingcostcodes.overwriteControllingCostCode: Overwrite existing controlling cost code assignment (if applicable)
controllingcostcodes.preserveSelection: Always use this options in this session
controllingcostcodes.confirmDeleteBody: This will delete selected controlling cost codes, it's children and their cost code assignments. Are you sure you want to continue?
